name: King Battle
description: R & D team effort for several years, focusing on the show the beauty of fighting! Even strokes, floating, block, dizziness, tyrants body, crushing fighting spirit! Focus on multiplayer!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics HD 4000 or Nvidia GT 620 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics HD 4000 or Nvidia GT 620 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
